DESCRIPTION:
arrange: create the testing model and deploy the Squid proxy charm and any charm
    act: instruct any-charm to request an HTTP proxy with restricted src_ips
    assert: the returned proxy should satisfy the request
NAME: test_proxy_src_ips

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: create the testing model and deploy the Squid proxy charm and any charm
    act: instruct any-charm to request an HTTP proxy with proxy authentication
    assert: the returned proxy should satisfy the request
NAME: test_proxy_userpass

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: deploy the http-proxy-policy charm with some proxy requirer charms.
    act: add some rules to the http-proxy-policy and integrate the requirer charms.
    assert: the requirer charm should receive the http proxy response according to the rules.
NAME: test_proxy_requests

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: deploy the http-proxy-policy charm.
    act: connect to the http-proxy-policy on the charm machine.
    assert: the server should respond correctly.
NAME: test_http_proxy_policy_server

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: deploy the Squid proxy charm
    act: get prometheus-squid-exporter metrics endpoint
    assert: metrics endpoint returns squid metrics
NAME: test_prometheus_exporter

DESCRIPTION:
Test the charm configuration in integrator mode.

    Args:
        juju: Jubilant juju fixture
        application: Name of the ingress-configurator application.
        squid_proxy: Name of the squid_proxy application.
        http_proxy_requirer: Name of the requirer application.
NAME: test_config_hostnames_and_paths

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: create the testing model and deploy the Squid proxy charm and any charm
    act: instruct any-charm to request an HTTP proxy with different restrictions
    assert: the returned proxy should satisfy the request
NAME: test_proxy_auth

DESCRIPTION:
arrange: create the testing model and deploy the Squid proxy charm and any-charm
    act: instruct any-charm to request an HTTP proxy from the Squid proxy charm
    assert: the returned proxy should satisfy the request
NAME: test_proxy
